titles: A dialogue between a pædo-baptist and an anti-pædo-baptist containing the strength of arguments offered on both sides at the Portsmouth disputation, with the addition of a few more arguments then ready to be offered in vindication of infant baptism / by Samuel Chandler and William Leigh.
author: Chandler, Samuel.
Leigh, William.
publisher: Printed for A. Chandler ... and sold by A. Baldwin,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
